{{Wireless embedded system |brand=X-Micro |model=XWL-11GRIX |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/02/2004 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RAFXWL-11GRIX |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Silicon Data |cpu1_model=SD9218-BB |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Inprocomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPN2220 |wi1_chip2_brand=Maxim |wi1_chip2_model=MAX2825 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.62.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} The latest firmware is available on the [http://www.x-micro.com/main-support_download.php '''X-Micro''' website]. :[http://web.archive.org/web/20051211192011/http://www.x-micro.com/driver/FIR%20-%20XWL-11GRIX%20-%20T20P6.zip Firmware version T20P6 (via archive.org)]
The device appears to be a [[Procomp PW8540IM]].
"GM8631S3" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
